ticker.title: Ticker
ticker.description: Represents a meme ticker available for trading.

videoUrl.description: Optional URL for an embeddable video from a social media platform.

isVerified.description: Indicates if the ticker is a verified token of a meme legend.

activity.title: Activity
activity.description: Represents a single trading, creation, or burn event in the activity feed.

value.description: The gross value of the transaction.

fee.description: The platform fee collected from this transaction.

userProfile.title: User Profile
userProfile.description: Stores public information about a user.

portfolioHolding.title: Portfolio Holding
portfolioHolding.description: Represents a user's holding of a specific ticker.

platformSettings.title: Platform Settings
platformSettings.description: Stores global settings for the platform.

signupEnabled.description: Controls whether new user registration is open.

platformStats.title: Platform Stats
platformStats.description: Stores global statistics for the platform, such as total fees generated and burned tokens.

totalFeesGenerated.description: The cumulative total of all fees (creation, buy, sell) collected in NGN.

totalTokensBurned.description: The total number of tokens (unique ticker holdings) burned by users.

/tickers/{tickerId}.description: Collection of all available meme tickers.

/activities/{activityId}.description: Collection of all user activities for the live feed.

/users/{userId}/portfolio/{holdingId}.description: Sub-collection for a user's portfolio holdings.

/stats/platform.description: A singleton document to store global platform statistics.
